name: Slimegirl Chronicles
description:
Shapeshift Serena is a super awesome, wonderful slimegirl who goes on cool adventures and stuff. Everyone admires her! She has the power to transform into various different objects to react to any obstacle she faces. She's an idol and inspiration to many. She's super cute too :3

But... who is this mysterious Nitro Nami? What's her deal? She just showed up mysteriously on the scene. Seems she has a beef with Serena... but what could it be?

That's all I'm going to tell you. Lots of crazy things happen in this game.

WebGL version and sound/music coming soon!
